channel.title: Qubes 4.01 & 4.02 rc question
channel.description:
Collected my new computer today and I want to install Qubes on it. Does the 4.01 version contain Whonix 15 as standard or would I need to remove 14 then download 15 separately.
If I install 4.02 rc once the stable version of 4.02 is released would I need to download it again or would the rc update to 4.02 when Dom 0 shows update available?

item.title: Qubes 4.01 & 4.02 rc question
item.dc:creator: Lilias
item.description:
Qubes 4.0.1 has whonix 14, Qubes 4.0.2 RC1 has whonix 15.

You don’t need to redownload the stable version, just updating dom0 will get you on the stable version.

Qubes OS – 9 Jul 19

Qubes OS 4.0.2-rc1 has been released!

We’re pleased to announce the first release candidate for Qubes 4.0.2! Features: All 4.0 dom0 updates to date Fedora 30 TemplateVM Debian 10 TemplateVM Whonix 15 Gateway and Workstation TemplateVMs Linux kernel 4.19 by default Qubes 4.0.2-rc1 is...

Read full topic
